name: Aldo Sassi
description: Italian methodology with three-day algorithm: SFR strength work, anaerobic threshold, and long climbs. Heavy data monitoring with daily feedback and strict anti-doping philosophy.
author: Based on Aldo Sassi's coaching philosophy at Mapei Center

philosophy.notes: Three-day repeating algorithm: Day 1 SFR (low cadence climbs), Day 2 anaerobic threshold, Day 3 long rides with climbs. Daily power data review. Builds self-belief through reference numbers. Strict commitment to clean sport required.

adjust_intensity_up: Power numbers confirm adaptation. Increase by {{percent}}% to progress.
adjust_intensity_up_rationale: Data shows stable power output with HR drift within acceptable parameters. Your numbers confirm adaptation is occurring. Progressive increase maintains the training stimulus without unnecessary risk.
adjust_intensity_down: HR drift exceeds parameters. Reduce intensity by {{percent}}% to stay in target zone.
adjust_intensity_down_rationale: Power data shows target adherence below threshold with HR drift exceeding safe parameters. Continuing at current intensity compromises the quality we monitor. Adjust to preserve the zone integrity.
extend_recovery: Recovery incomplete based on metrics. Extend by {{seconds}} seconds.
extend_recovery_rationale: HR data indicates incomplete recovery from previous block. The SFR and threshold work requires full recovery between efforts. Extend now to ensure tomorrow's numbers meet standards.
skip_remaining_on_intervals: Power dropping significantly. Terminate session and recover properly.
skip_remaining_on_intervals_rationale: Power decline across multiple intervals with elevated HR drift indicates excessive fatigue. The data shows compromised execution. Terminate now, upload data, and we analyze why this occurred for tomorrow's adjustments.

completion: Session complete. Data uploaded for analysis.
Workout executed as prescribed. Check email for tomorrow's adjustments.
Training done. Rest and prepare for the next block.
